PM or [URL="mikefrohme@yahoo.com"]email me[/URL] an offer if you're interested.  Prices assume Paypal "payment owed" and include shipping.

Click on images below for full size scans, or see the Sale/Trade link in the signature for those and other T cards and more.

Maddox - SGC 30 - $270                                   Miller - $115                                                    Abstein - $100
